args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E]

/-- If f : E â†’ â„ is differentiable at x0 and has a local minimum at x0, then the derivative is 0. -/
theorem fderiv_eq_zero_of_isLocalMin {f : E â†’ â„} {x0 : E}
  (hdiff : DifferentiableAt â„ f x0) (hmin : IsLocalMin f x0) :
  fderiv â„ f x0 = (0 : E â†’L[â„] â„) := by sorry
